TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ComputerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性，以取得電腦的記憶體、已載入組件、名稱和作業系統的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides properties for getting information about the computer's memory, loaded assemblies, name, and operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所公開的屬性`My.Computer.Info`物件傳回從中部署應用程式，電腦相關資訊，因為在執行階段決定。The properties exposed by the `My.Computer.Info` object return information about the computer from which the application is deployed, as determined at run time. 一般而言，這項資料會不同於所沒有的開發電腦上。Typically, this data differs from what was available on the development computer. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性以顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的可用實體記憶體數量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailablePhysicalMemory As ULong
public: property System::UInt64 AvailablePhysicalMemory { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦可用實體記憶體的總量。

span.span: Gets the total amount of free physical memory for the computer.

value.span: ，包含電腦可用實體記憶體的位元組數。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of free physical memory for the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。The `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性以顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的可用實體記憶體數量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the memory status.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableVirtualMemory As ULong
public: property System::UInt64 AvailableVirtualMemory { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦可用虛擬位址空間的總量。

span.span: Gets the total amount of the computer's free virtual address space.

value.span: ，包含電腦可用虛擬位址空間的位元組數。

span.span: A containing the number of bytes of the computer's free virtual address space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。The `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`屬性以顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的可用虛擬記憶體數量。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property to display the amount of available virtual memory for the computer on which the code runs. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the memory status.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstalledUICulture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ InstalledUICulture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得作業系統所安裝的目前 UI 文化特性。

span.span: Gets the current UI culture installed with the operating system.

value.span: 物件表示電腦上所安裝的 UI 文化特性。

span.span: A object represents the UI culture installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`屬性具有相同的行為屬性。The `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property has the same behavior as the property. 在當地語系化的作業系統，例如日文 Windows 2000 Professional，這個屬性會傳回作業系統的文化特性。In a localized operating system, such as Japanese Windows 2000 Professional, this property returns the culture of the operating system. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`屬性來顯示作業系統的 UI 文化特性名稱。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property to display the name of the operating system's UI culture. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSFullName As String
public: property System::String ^ OSFullName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得完整作業系統名稱。

span.span: Gets the full operating system name.
A containing the operating-system name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果電腦上已安裝 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)，這個屬性會傳回作業系統名稱的詳細的資訊。This property returns detailed information about the operating system name if Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) is installed on the computer. 否則，這個屬性會傳回相同的字串`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性，可提供較少的 WMI 所無法提供詳細資訊。Otherwise, this property returns the same string as the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property, which provides less detailed information than WMI can provide. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSFullName`的作業系統屬性來顯示電腦的名稱。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSFullName` property to display the name of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼沒有完全信任。

span.span: The calling code does not have full trust.

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSPlatform As String
public: property System::String ^ OSPlatform { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦作業系統的平台識別項。

span.span: Gets the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer.

value.span: ，包含電腦作業系統的平台識別項，從 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的成員名稱中選擇。

span.span: A containing the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer, chosen from the member names of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性所傳回的物件屬性。The `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property provides functionality similar to the property of the object returned by the property. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性來顯示電腦的平台的作業系統。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property to display the platform of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

exception.span: 應用程式無法取得作業系統的平台資訊。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the operating-system platform information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OSVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ OSVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦作業系統的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the computer's operating system.

value.span: ，包含目前作業系統的版本號碼。

span.span: A containing the current version number of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性格式化為 「 major.minor.build 」 版本。The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property formats the version as "major.minor.build.revision". `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性所傳回的物件屬性。The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property provides functionality similar to the property of the object returned by the property. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性來顯示電腦的版本的作業系統。This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property to display the version of the computer's operating system. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

exception.span: 應用程式無法取得作業系統版本資訊。

span.span: The application cannot obtain the operating-system version information.
